title: Round 2 Counseling Doubt
content:
So, I missed round 1 , I have 49x rank in PESSAT, What are my chances for Round 2.  
Also could we know the vacant seat matrix beforehand?(I don't want to travel 2000km+ just to hear that no seats are available in my desired branch.

comments.body: You have a decent shot at it. The seat matrix is usually put up on the website and also emailed to you beforehand (but at most a few days before).
Oh if they put it on website than its okay ig, BITS and Manipal cooked me for life
Bro I'm really hanging on straws here
